title: World Series Thoughts Plus Hasan Minhaj | The Bill Simmons Podcast (Ep. 433)
description:
HBO and The Ringer's Bill Simmons shares his World Series thoughts after watching Game 1 in Fenway Park (2:00), then Bill sits down with comedian Hasan Minhaj to talk comedy, the NBA, and his new weekly Netflix series 'Patriot Act,' premiering October 28 (20:10).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
